name: Balloon Ascent
description:
Made for the first Newbies Game Jam

When I heard the theme of minimalism the first thing I thought of was the art style.  Then I remembered I can't draw so I made the game mechanics minimalistic instead.

You control a small balloon floating into the sky.  It blows from left and right in the wind and all you can do is make it float higher.  This is the only control you have in the game.  Your goal is to get to the top of every level while anything you touch will cause the balloon to pop forcing you to start from the bottom again.
